attributes.action: stop motorists subsidising other tax payers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The motorist contributes billions more in taxes to the exchequer than is spent on the roads, how is this fair?
Public services should be paid for from general taxation not one specific group. Therefore I propose that motoring taxes are cut to the level that produces the required revenue to pay for the roads and the shortfall is made up from general taxes like income tax and vat.
